scheduled

Class EditScheduleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.MainMenuDriveController
      • scheduled.EditScheduleController

  • public class EditScheduleController
extends MainMenuDriveController
    Populates a table with the users scheduled rides from the SCHEDULEINFO table. Allows user to edit the columns LOCATION, DESTINATION, DATE, and TIME from the SCHEDULEINFO table. Allows the user to navigate to the scheduled.ViewDriver.fxml scene. Date 11/21/2018

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EditScheduleController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeScheduleInfo()
      When this method is called, the SCHEDULEINFO table's columns LOCATION, DESTINATION, DATE and TIME will be updated with the information with in the combobox, pickdate, and picktime.
      void confirmChangeButtonPushed()
      When this button is pushed, the information from the SCHEDULEINFO tables columns LOCATION, DESTINATION, DATE, and TIME will update to what the user has placed in the text fields.
      javafx.collections.ObservableList<User> getRiderInfo()
      When this method is called, it will set the values inside the table.
      void initialize()
      When the scene first loads, it will populate the combo boxes and place information pulled form the SCHEDULEINFO table into the table view.
      void mainMenuButtonPushed()
      When this button is pushed, the scene will change to the main.MainMenuDriveControler.fxml if the boolean value (isAdriver) is true, or main.MainMenuRideController.fxml if the value is false.
      void selectedRow()
      When the table is clicked, the person field will be set to all the values from the table.
      void setPerson(User person)
      Used to set the information from the selected row to the person field.
      void viewDriverButtonPushed()
      When this button is pushed, the scene will change to the scheduled.ViewDriver.fxml scene.

        accountSettingsButtonPushed, backMenuPushed, displaySelection, editScheduleButtonPushed, getDayOf, getPerson, getResultSet, getStartUp, getTimeOf, getUser, pushToDatabase, reloadButtonPushed, scheduleButtonPushed, scheduleRide, setDateTime, setDayAndTimeSelected, setSelectedUser, setUser, showTable, signOutButtonPushed, user, userSelected

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        When the scene first loads, it will populate the combo boxes and place information pulled form the SCHEDULEINFO table into the table view.
        Overrides:
        initialize in class MainMenuDriveController
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception.

      • confirmChangeButtonPushed

        public void confirmChangeButtonPushed()
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        When this button is pushed, the information from the SCHEDULEINFO tables columns LOCATION, DESTINATION, DATE, and TIME will update to what the user has placed in the text fields.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception.

      • selectedRow

        public void selectedRow()
        When the table is clicked, the person field will be set to all the values from the table.

      • getRiderInfo

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<User> getRiderInfo()
                                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        When this method is called, it will set the values inside the table. The values are pulled from the SCHEDULEINFO table columns LOCATION, DESTINATION, DATE and TIME.
        Overrides:
        getRiderInfo in class MainMenuDriveController
        Returns:
        the list of users pulled from the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception.

      • changeScheduleInfo

        public void changeScheduleInfo()
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        When this method is called, the SCHEDULEINFO table's columns LOCATION, DESTINATION, DATE and TIME will be updated with the information with in the combobox, pickdate, and picktime. The selection that will be updated is the row the user has active on the table view.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception.

      • setPerson

        public void setPerson(User person)
        Used to set the information from the selected row to the person field.
        Parameters:
        person - the selected person from the table view.

      • mainMenuButtonPushed

        public void mainMenuButtonPushed()
                          throws java.io.IOException
        When this button is pushed, the scene will change to the main.MainMenuDriveControler.fxml if the boolean value (isAdriver) is true, or main.MainMenuRideController.fxml if the value is false.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - the IO exception.

      • viewDriverButtonPushed

        public void viewDriverButtonPushed()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        When this button is pushed, the scene will change to the scheduled.ViewDriver.fxml scene.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - the IO exception.
